column5: And the hits just keep rolling on ..https://todaynewspost.com/news/world...5kIJr_lVae2U-0
That was not on my list of issues that I might have to deal with in order to fish NWO this fall! What else will pop up?

This might cause delays but they won’t go back on their announcement because of this. If you suppress your economy further because half of your border agents walk out then you don’t want it opened bad enough. This is a well timed play by the union. I would bet my hunt that they settle before it would come to a strike. The political optics of that are horrible

Can't blame them as the recent announcement of reopening will certainly give them some extra leverage in negotiations this year. Last contract ended in 2018. Just adjust your crossing time to very early am.

How about one of the driest, hottest summers on record? I was up in the boundary waters last week, and the air was hazy with smoke at times, from fires up there. Traveling to Ontario in August, there are going to be some areas where we just won't be able to go........
